name: Allspice
alternatives: Equal parts cinnamon, nutmeg and cloves(Kruidnagel in Dutch).

name: Basil
alternatives: Mint cousins'-> Greek oregano, mint or thyme.

name: Cardamom
alternatives: Allspice, a mix of cinnamon and ginger, or nutmeg

name: Cayenne pepper
alternatives: Regular black pepper, chili powder, red pepper flakes

name: Celery Seed
alternatives: Caraway seeds. Parsley, minced celery tops (2 tbsp per 1/2 ts celery seeds)

name: Cinnamon
alternatives: Allspice, cardamon, ginger, pumpkin pie seasoning, or nutmeg (1/4 amount)

name: Cloves
alternatives: Substitute whole with ground and vice versa, or use nutmeg, allspice, cinnamon, cardamom

name: Coriander
alternatives: Basil. caraway seeds, cumin, fennel, or a combination. In Indian cuisine, fenugreek leaves.

name: Cumin
alternatives: Ground coriander, caraway seeds, nigella seeds

name: Fenugreek seeds
alternatives: Yellow mustard seeds, masala curry powder, maple syrup, cumin seeds

name: Garlic
alternatives: Replace ground with fresh/grated garlic and vice versa. Fresh will reduce shelf-life, ground is much stronger. Others: Onion, Cumin, or Hing (Asafoedita, Google before use, much stronger, not suitable for everyone)

name: Ginger
alternatives: Replace fresh/ground ginger. Other substitues: cinnamon, cardamom, clove powder. Keep in mind using fresh ginger will reduce shelf life of your mix.

name: Juniper Berries
alternatives: Coriander seeds, cumin seeds, allspice, black peppercorns, bay leaf

name: Mustard seed
alternatives: Caraway seeds, horseradish, wholegrain mustard (reduces shelf life), fennel

name: Oregano
alternatives: Basil, parsley, tarragon, dill, sage, thyme

name: Paprika
alternatives: Cayenne pepper, chili powder, red chili frakes

name: Saffron
alternatives: Combination of tumeric, smoked paprika and cardamom. Safflower.

name: Sesame seeds
alternatives: Hemp, flax, poppy, sunflower or pumpkin seeds

name: Smoked paprika
alternatives: Regular paprika, smoked seasalt, chilipowder, cayenne

name: Thyme
alternatives: Basil, oregano, marjoram, savory, rosemary, bay

name: sugar
alternatives: Cinnamon, allspice, ginger, or for immediate use: honey, syrup
